模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 TargetCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.TargetCard
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
直接已知子类:
CountTargetCard, ObliqueTargetCard, PositionGoalTarget
public abstract class TargetCard extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an abstract TargetCard in the game. A TargetCard has properties such as ID, base points, and a flag indicating if it's a common target card. Subclasses must implement the methods to check goals and count points.
另请参阅:
